AskSlim Market Week - Saturday, May 18 The stock market had a volatile and choppy week, starting sharply lower in the beginning of the week and then seeing a mid-week rally only to pull back by week's end. The market moved on good consumer sentiment numbers, China news and Trump actions.Barron's Picks And Pans: Nordstrom, Pinterest, Take-Two Interactive And More This weekend's Barron's cover story offers reasons why investors should not panic about the trade war.
Another featured article suggests five cheap stocks to ride out the...Apple CEO Tim Cook: 'If you love what you do, you will never work a day in your life' is 'total crock' Speaking to the 2019 graduating class of Tulane University, Tim Cook talks about the importance of working towards your purpose.Bulls And Bears Of The Week: Apple, Chevron, FedEx, Uber And More Benzinga has examined prospects for many investor favorite stocks over the past week. 
Bullish calls included tech giants and a big oil leader.
Bearish calls included biotechs...Tim Cook Says His Era Has Failed by Over-Debating Climate Change Skyworks Solutions: Don't Miss This Cheap 5G Stock The chipmaker is struggling because of weak smartphone demand, but that could soon change.Apple CEO Tim Cook to the class of 2019: 'My generation has failed you' Apple CEO Tim Cook was the commencement speaker at Tulane University Saturday. In his speech, the tech executive focused on the importance of addressing climate change and more broadly, in taking action, rather than debating endlessly.VC Deals: Funds Feed Impossible Foods, Uber Eats Competitor Welcome to Seeking Alpha's Venture Capital Deals of the Week. The firm owned 127,566 shares of the iPhone maker’s stock after selling 2,973 shares during the period. Apple comprises 2.9% of Boston Common Asset Management LLC’s holdings, making the stock its 4th biggest position.
